channel.title: publications on Eric Brasil
channel.description: Recent content in publications on Eric Brasil

item.title: New article about pyHDB tool!
item.description: English version On the last day of 2022, the new issue of the História da Historiografia journal came out with an article of mine called “pyHDB - Ferramenta Heurística para a Hemeroteca Digital Brasileira: utilizando técnicas de web scraping para a pesquisa em História”. It is my darling! In the article, I present pyHDB, a methodological support tool for research in the Brazilian Digital Newspaper Library, of the National Library.
